name: Ad Attack
description:
"Play as our heroine, Vax, as she traverses a dystopian future with real-life pop-up ads! Slice and dice your way through the city and reclaim your home from annoying advertising."

This mobile game was created with a satyrical approach to pop-up ads in casual gaming. Instead of having to sit through them, slice through them!

Ad Attack Team:

TJ Branch - Lead Designer, Programmer

Leah C. Holm - 2D Artist, Character Designer

Trey Martinez - Designer

Ben Kuderick - Designer, Programmer

Brian Mikolajczyk - 2D Aritst

Samantha Sander - 2D Artist
